reference.shortdesc: The organizationinfo element contains detailed information about an authoring organization.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <organizationinfo> <namedetails> <organizationnamedetails> <organizationname>WizardWorks, Inc.</organizationname> <otherinfo>'Best wizard in Oz'</otherinfo> </organizationnamedetails> </namedetails> <addressdetails> <thoroughfare>123 Yellow Brick Road</thoroughfare> <locality>Emerald City</locality> <administrativearea>Kansas</administrativearea> <country>USA</country> </addressdetails> <contactnumbers><contactnumber>123-555-4678</contactnumber></contactnumbers> <emailaddresses><emailaddress>wizard@example.org</emailaddress></emailaddresses> <urls><url>www.wizardworks.example.org</url></urls> </organizationinfo>
